Reviews.Title: So pleased
Reviews.Author: Diana Holberg
Reviews.Content: This laptop is fast and runs cool and quietly - perfect! I had a little difficulty determining how to control which graphics card would be used for which programs, but that's all figured out now, so I'm thrilled :)

ProductInfo.Features:
Processor: Intel Core i7-4700HQ Quad Core Processor (6M Cache, 2.40GHz - 3.40 GHz) 47W
Hard Drive: 2 x 1TB 5400rpm Hard Disk Drive
RAM: 16GB DDR3 1600MHz 1.35V RAM
Graphics: nVIDIA Geforce GT 740M 2GB
16GB RAM Upgrade* | View Product Description for complete details and notes
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS X750JB-DB71 17.3" i7-4700HQ 2.4GHz 16GB 2 x 1TB 5400rpm HDD W8 Laptop Computer
